bomb31.rules: Count up by tapping +1, +2, or +3. The player who hits 31 loses and drinks!

nunchitap.rules: Tap the screen in sequence. No talking. If two players tap at the same time, they both drink!
nunchitap.fail_message: Double tap detected. You both drink!

vibevote.rules: Read the prompt. Everyone points at the person who fits it best. Spin the wheel to see the loser's consequence.
prompts: Who has the worst taste in music?
Who is most likely to get arrested tonight?
Who sends the boldest drunk texts?
Who takes the longest to get ready?
Who is most likely to ghost a date?
Who spends the most money on stupid things?
Who would die first in a horror movie?

neverhave.rules: Read the prompt. If you've done it, take a drink.
prompts: Never have I ever ghosted someone.
Never have I ever lied about my age.
Never have I ever sent a risky text to the wrong person.
Never have I ever fake cried to get out of trouble.
Never have I ever checked my ex's social media.
Never have I ever stolen something from a hotel.
Never have I ever skipped work/class to sleep.
Never have I ever forgotten an anniversary or birthday.

kingscup.rules: Draw a card. Follow the rule. The 4th King drawn must end the game and drink the center cup!
kingscup.game_over_msg: You drew the final King. Finish the center cup!

A.title: Waterfall
A.desc: Everyone starts drinking. You can't stop until the person to your right stops.

4.title: Floor
4.desc: Everyone touches the floor. Last one drinks.

7.title: Heaven
7.desc: Reach for the sky. Last one drinks.

8.title: Mate
8.desc: Pick a mate. Every time you drink, they drink.

9.title: Rhyme
9.desc: Say a word. Go in a circle rhyming. First to mess up drinks.

10.title: Categories
10.desc: Pick a category (e.g., cars). Go in a circle. First to mess up drinks.

J.title: Rule Master
J.desc: Make a rule that lasts the whole game. Anyone who breaks it drinks.

Q.title: Question Master
Q.desc: Ask someone a question. If they answer without a question, they drink.

K.title: King's Cup
K.desc: Pour some of your drink into the center cup.
